Package ohos.agp.components

Class ListComponent.ListLayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
      • ohos.agp.components.ListComponent.ListLayoutConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    ListComponent

    public static class ListComponent.ListLayoutConfig
extends ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
    Inherits from ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig and provides methods to enable a component in the ListComponent to access the corresponding ComponentOwner.
    Since:
    7

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListLayoutConfig

        public ListLayoutConfig​()
        Default constructor used to create a ListLayoutConfig instance.

        The width and height of this instance are set to MATCH_CONTENT by default.

        Since:
        7

      • ListLayoutConfig

        public ListLayoutConfig​(Context context,
                        AttrSet attrSet)
        A constructor used to create a ListLayoutConfig instance based on the specified attribute set.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set to use.
        Since:
        7

      • ListLayoutConfig

        public ListLayoutConfig​(int width,
                        int height)
        A constructor used to create a ListLayoutConfig instance based on the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width, in pixels. The value can be ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT.
        height - Indicates the height, in pixels. The value can be ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT.
        Since:
        7

      • ListLayoutConfig

        public ListLayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create a ListLayoutConfig instance based on an existing ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig instance.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the existing ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig instance to use.
        Since:
        7

    • Method Detail

      • getComponentOwner

        public ComponentOwner getComponentOwner​()
        Obtains theComponentOwner corresponding to this ListLayoutConfig.
        Returns:
        Returns the ComponentOwner if obtained; returns null if no owner is set.
        Since:
        7

      • applyToComponent

      • setFullLane

        public void setFullLane​(boolean fullLane)
        Sets whether the component corresponding to this ListLayoutConfig occupies all lanes in the masonry layout.
        Parameters:
        fullLane - Specifies whether the component occupies all the lanes. The value true means that the component occupies all the lanes, and false means the opposite.
        Since:
        7

      • getFullLane

        public boolean getFullLane​()
        Checks whether the component corresponding to this ListLayoutConfig occupies all lanes in the masonry layout.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the component occupies all the lanes; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        7
